scripts.start: tsc --watch && copy index.html dist\index.html && (echo SET "s|./dist/index.js|./index.js|" & SET "file=dist\index.html" & powershell -Command "(Get-Content $env:file) -replace $env:s, '' | Set-Content $env:file")
scripts.build: tsc && copy index.html dist\index.html && (echo SET "s|./dist/index.js|./index.js|" & SET "file=dist\index.html" & powershell -Command "(Get-Content $env:file) -replace $env:s, '' | Set-Content $env:file")
